bilingual.source: It's useful for the growth of the plant.
bilingual.target: 它对植物的生长很有用。

bilingual.source: Enough sunlight and water can promote rapid growth in plants.
bilingual.target: 充足的阳光和水分能够促进植物的快速生长。

bilingual.source: Children can develop problems with behavior, learning, hearing, and slower growth.
bilingual.target: 儿童可能会出现行为、学习、听力和生长缓慢的问题。

bilingual.source: Scientists study auxin to understand plant growth.
bilingual.target: 科学家研究植物生长素以了解植物生长。
活检显示组织异常生长。
高温会影响植物的生长。

bilingual.source: He admired the briony for its rapid growth.
bilingual.target: 他赞赏白英的快速生长。

bilingual.source: Scientists study vegf to understand its role in cancer growth.
bilingual.target: 科学家研究血管内皮生长因子以了解其在癌症生长中的作用。

bilingual.source: The hair bulb is important for hair growth.
bilingual.target: 毛球对头发的生长很重要。

bilingual.source: The algal growth on the rocks was slippery.
bilingual.target: 岩石上的藻类生长物很滑。

list.abstract: 科技名词定义 英文名称：growth 中文名称：生长 定义1：液态金属或固态金属中生成的固相或新相微型质点(晶核)长大的过程。 所属学科：机械工程（一级学科）；铸造（二级学科）；一般铸造名词（三级学科） 定义2：生物个体长度与重量的增长。 所属学科：水产学（一级学科）；水产基础科学（二级学科）

yingyinNormal.en: Cuttlefish genes were added to help her withstand an accelerated growth rate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她的体内加入了乌贼基因，帮助减缓快速的生长率。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that growth linear or accelerating? Accelerating.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是线性增长还是加速增长呢？是加速增长。

yingyinNormal.en: What was that? Believe it or not, personal growth. What happened?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么东西？你信不信，他现在开窍了？是什么事？

yingyinNormal.en: And that's the longest streak of private-sector job growth on record.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是有史以来持续最长时间私营部门的就业增长。

yingyinNormal.en: Like us, they appear to have a population growth rate that's unsustainable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向我们一样，他们也有过度的人口增长。

yingyinNormal.en: Similar to 1950s, London and LA, it's painful with higher growth rate, you see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，这不比20世纪50年代那时的伦敦和洛杉矶好多了吗？是的，高速的经济增长总是伴随着痛苦。

yingyinNormal.en: Yup. everything since the eighth grade. The eighth grade? My last growth spurt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，从我八年级到现在所有的。八年级？我从那时起就不再长了。

yingyinNormal.en: And we're on pace to make 2014 the strongest year of job growth since the 1990s.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正在一步步接近这样的目标，让2014年成为自1990年代以来就业增长最多的年份。

yingyinNormal.en: Every country in the world dreams of having the growth rate of Shanghai and China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界上每座城市都梦想着有上海和中国的发展速度。

yingyinNormal.en: I think she may have some kind of growth in there, something pressing on her brain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想她脑袋里可能长了什么东西，所以才会变成这样的。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's do this because it would make our economy stronger and make sure that growth is shared.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们去这样做，因为这将让我们的经济更加壮大并确保这样的增长能够被分享。

yingyinNormal.en: We also know that the upswing in job growth this year has come in industries with higher wages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们也了解到，今年在工业上就业增长的上升也促进了工资的上涨。

yingyinNormal.en: When faster growth and full employment return, you can bet inflation will be along to spoil the party.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当经济体成长而就业率回升时，你可以确定的是通货膨胀又会过来破坏你对未来的美好期待了。

yingyinNormal.en: Our investments in American manufacturing have helped fuel its best stretch of job growth since the 90s.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在美国制造业上的投资，使其延续了自90年代以来最好的就业增长。

yingyinNormal.en: With equipment on board, we incubate the first 10. After that, with surrogacy, the growth becomes exponential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 飞船上有设备，我们会先孵化十个，这之后，用代孕的方式，让人口指数倍增。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it's us that's dreaming, thinking that we can carry on in this frenzy of growth without any consequences.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许在做梦的是我们吧，自认为能继续着疯狂的发展却不引发任何后果。

yingyinNormal.en: I've come to the Columbia river gorge myself to get a closer look at what's driving this phenomenal growth of wind power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只身来到了哥伦比亚河谷来一探究竟，是什么使风能发展如此迅速。

yingyinNormal.en: We just have to invest in the things that we know will secure even faster growth in higher-paying jobs for more Americans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须投资于一些我们所了解的方面这些方面，将让更高工资的就业岗位增长地更快，这会对更多的国人有利。

yingyinNormal.en: And the states where the minimum wage has gone up this year have experienced higher job growth than the states that haven't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些提高了最低工资标准的各州今年的就业增长更快。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, speaking of personal growth, I recently tried eating Swiss chard. You know, I didn't swallow it, but Amy said it counted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说到个人成长，我最近尝试吃了瑞士甜菜。我只嚼没咽，但艾米说这样就很棒了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 生长; 增长; 发展

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 成人的；成熟的；适合于成年人的
n. 生长；成长；增大；发展；生长物；一熟；某葡萄园所产的葡萄；由这些葡萄酿造的葡萄酒；赘生物；发育
v. 长得太大使不再适用；过大而不适于；成长得不再有；长大后不再有；长得比…快；长得比…高
n. 栽培者；种植者；以某种方式生长的植物

word_family.mean: v. 生长；成长；发育；增大；发展；增加；逐渐变得；变得越来越；种植；形成

sense_info_list.zh: 生长; 增长; 发展

examination_example.sentence: Each of these manifestations of <highlight>growth</highlight> carried its own peculiar problems in its wake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一种增长的表现形式都伴随着其自身的特殊问题。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>growth</highlight> in the number of corporations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业数量的增长。

examination_example.sentence: We have not been good at communicating the real value that housing can contribute to economic <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直不善于传达房地产行业能给经济增长创造的实际价值。

sample.mean: n. 幅度；宽度；广度；广泛性；宽宏；宽容；门幅；幅面；一幅；整体效果

n. 事实；真相；真实性；（Truth）人名：特鲁思

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 可持续增长；持续增长；可持续增长率

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 成人的；成熟的；适合于成年人的
n. 生长；成长；增大；发展；生长物；一熟；某葡萄园所产的葡萄；由这些葡萄酿造的葡萄酒；赘生物；发育
v. 长得太大使不再适用；过大而不适于；成长得不再有；长大后不再有；长得比…快；长得比…高
n. 栽培者；种植者；以某种方式生长的植物

word_family.mean: v. 生长；成长；发育；增大；发展；增加；逐渐变得；变得越来越；种植；形成

sense_info_list.en: the process of increasing in amount, value, or importance

examination_example.sentence: It contributes to intellectual <highlight>growth</highlight> but can easily be killed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于智力成长，但很容易被扼杀。

examination_example.sentence: Grass-fed beef is enjoying a 25-30% annual <highlight>growth</highlight> rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 草饲牛肉的年增长率为25～30%。

examination_example.sentence: Taking into account not only <highlight>growth</highlight> in consumption per person but also changes in working time, life expectancy, and inequality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑了人均消费的增长，还考虑了工作时间，预期寿命和经济不平等等方面的变化。

sense_info_list.en: the process of developing or maturing physically

examination_example.sentence: Managers usually love people who can self-sustain and enable <highlight>growth</highlight> through taking initiative, who are strong at following through their work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经理们通常喜欢那些能够自我维持并通过采取主动实现增长的人，那些在工作中坚持不懈的人。

examination_example.sentence: First of all, guidance from adults should never be absent during the whole process of young people's <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，在年轻人成长的整个过程中，成年人的引导是不应该缺席的。

examination_example.sentence: Others talked about enjoying their own company, of <highlight>growth</highlight> through adversity, deepening bonds of friendships, the ability to be more compassionate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人则谈到了她们会享受独处，在逆境中成长，加深友谊的纽带，更富有同情心。

sense_info_list.en: something that has grown or is growing

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 成人的；成熟的；适合于成年人的
n. 生长；成长；增大；发展；生长物；一熟；某葡萄园所产的葡萄；由这些葡萄酿造的葡萄酒；赘生物；发育

word_family.mean: v. 生长；成长；发育；增大；发展；增加；逐渐变得；变得越来越；种植；形成

sense_info_list.en: the process of developing or maturing physically

examination_example.sentence: That is, we taught them a <highlight>growth</highlight> mindset about their social lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，我们培养了他们一种关于社交生活的成长观念。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>growth</highlight> mindset ideas help young people adapt to the challenges of high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些成长心态的想法帮助年轻人适应高中的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Michael Yogman believes the idea that parents should carefully schedule children's time may not be helpful to their <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Michael Yogman博士认为，父母仔细安排孩子时间的想法可能对孩子的成长没有帮助。

sense_info_list.en: the process of increasing in amount; value; or importance

examination_example.sentence: Which countries have the fastest forest <highlight>growth</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪些国家的森林生长最快？

examination_example.sentence: Indra Nooky, PepsiCo chairman, said the plan to make its products healthier was important for the company's <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司董事长Indra Nooyi表示，让产品更健康的计划对公司的发展很重要。

examination_example.sentence: Levels of outdoor pollution have grown rapidly along with rapid <highlight>growth</highlight> in industry and transportation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着工业和交通的快速增长，室外污染水平迅速上升。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 成人的；成熟的；适合于成年人的
n. 生长；成长；增大；发展；生长物；一熟；某葡萄园所产的葡萄；由这些葡萄酿造的葡萄酒；赘生物；发育
n. 栽培者；种植者；以某种方式生长的植物

word_family.mean: v. 生长；成长；发育；增大；发展；增加；逐渐变得；变得越来越；种植；形成

examination_example.sentence: It promotes their academic performance and emotional <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它促进了他们的学业表现和情感成长。

examination_example.sentence: What marked the turning point in the author's <highlight>growth</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 什么标志着作者成长的转折点？

examination_example.sentence: Instead, it's a healthy way to work through the experience to allow room for positive <highlight>growth</highlight> and forgiveness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，这是一个健康的方式来度过这段经历，给积极的成长和宽恕留下空间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 生长；成长；增大；发展；生长物；一熟；某葡萄园所产的葡萄；由这些葡萄酿造的葡萄酒；赘生物；发育

word_family.mean: v. 生长；成长；发育；增大；发展；增加；逐渐变得；变得越来越；种植；形成

examination_example.sentence: The difference between the fern and the bamboo mentioned in the passage is their <highlight>growth</highlight> .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文中提到的蕨类和竹类的区别在于它们的生长。

examination_example.sentence: A lot of screen time affects children's brain <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长时间看屏幕会影响孩子的大脑发育。

examination_example.sentence: It helps with bone <highlight>growth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它有助于骨骼生长。

examination_example.sentence: Now in its fifth year, with the rapid <highlight>growth</highlight> of the company, Bock employs 40 people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第五年，随着公司快速发展，博克雇佣了40名员工。

examination_example.sentence: The high-speed <highlight>growth</highlight> of forests cannot happen without public participation (参与).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 森林的高速生长离不开公众参与。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>growth</highlight> mainly came from China’s forest protection programs, NASA said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国宇航局表示，增长主要来自中国的森林保护计划。

sample.mean: n. 幅度；宽度；广度；广泛性；宽宏；宽容；门幅；幅面；一幅；整体效果
n. 长度；长；一段；一片；程度；球距；时间长度；身高
n. 欢乐；欢笑
n. 秘密行动；背人的活动；隐形
n. 暖和；温暖；暖热；热情；热心；激动；仁慈
n. 事实；真相；真实性；（Truth）人名：特鲁思

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常指抽象名词
